title: Homepage Hero Section
description:
Implement Hero Section for West Houston Small Business Website

Create a conversion-optimized hero section that immediately communicates value to small business owners in west Houston and drives them toward the primary call-to-action.

Content Requirements:
- Headline: Craft compelling, benefit-focused headline targeting small businesses in west Houston (concise, impactful, speaks to pain points or aspirations)
- Value Proposition: Clear statement of unique value specifically for local small business audience (what sets this service apart, why west Houston businesses should care)
- Subheadline: Concise description of core services offered (2-3 sentence summary supporting the main headline)
- CTA Button: Prominent, action-oriented call-to-action with clear next step (e.g., "Get Your Free Consultation", "Start Growing Today")

Design Requirements:
- Mobile-First Approach: Design for mobile viewports first, then scale up
- Responsive Breakpoints: Ensure proper layout adaptation at mobile (< 640px), tablet (640-1024px), and desktop (> 1024px) sizes
- Typography Hierarchy: Establish clear visual hierarchy with appropriate font sizes, weights, and line heights for each element across all breakpoints
- Visual Balance: Ensure headline, value prop, subheadline, and CTA are properly spaced and weighted for optimal readability and conversion

Technical Considerations:
- Semantic HTML structure for accessibility and SEO
- Optimize font loading to prevent layout shift
- Ensure CTA button has sufficient contrast ratio (WCAG AA minimum)
- Test touch targets on mobile (minimum 44x44px for CTA)
- Implement smooth responsive scaling without horizontal scroll

Success Criteria:
- Hero section is fully readable and functional on all device sizes
- Clear visual hierarchy guides user attention from headline → value prop → CTA
- CTA button is immediately visible and actionable
- Typography scales proportionally and remains legible at all breakpoints
- Local value proposition for west Houston small businesses is immediately apparent
